---

**Federal Government Tender Announcement**

* **Title**:  Transmitter Group, Humidity-Temperature Unit 
* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01004731
* **Amendment Number:** 0
* **Publication Date:** September 20, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 31, 2022 14:00:00 hours
* **Solicitation Number:** W8482-230676/A

**Procurement Information**

* **G-SIN Code:** 6885 (Pressure, Temperature, and Humidity Measuring and Controlling Instruments - Installation)
* **Procurement Category:** SRVTGD
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** The following agreements are applicable
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Contracting Entity**

* **Name:** Department of National Defence
* **Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact Information**

* **Name:** Russell, Arielle
* **Email:** arielle.russell@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone:** 819-939-3646

**Tender Documents**

* **Official Languages:** French and English
* **Attachment:** RFP Attachment introduced by English and French documents can be accessed at [link]

**Project Scope**

The Department of National Defence invites bids for the supply and delivery of the Transmitter Group, Humidity-Temperature Unit to Canadian Forces Base Halifax and Esquimalt. The tender requires the submission of detailed bid prices in Canadian dollars.

The requirement necessitates a quantity of 16 units at CFB Halifax and 10 units at CFB Esquimalt. Successful bidders will be required to supply details of the equipment, including the
